reviews.text:
Very relaxed brew pub perfect for hanging out and catching up. 
We split the chicken burger, which they were kind enough to cut in half for sharing. Fries...
You want high energy atmosphere?  You want to hear laughter and fun around you?  Head to Barleys when there is a Crew game and a CBJ game scheduled for that...

Ukrainian imperial stout - excellent
They grew all their own beer. You could take a growler home, but that doesn't help when you live in another state....
